bill.summary: 5/25/2006--Introduced. Directs the Administrator of General Services to install a photovaltaic system, as set forth in the Sun Wall Design Project, for the headquarters building of the Department of Energy located at 1000 Independence Avenue, Southwest, Washington, D.C., commonly known as the Forrestal Building.
